abstract.para: Enable and establish network connection to access and connect devices and resources to perform actions.

section.title: Enable Network Connection
section.para: Enable network connection using the nmcli command to establish network connections.

step.para: View the list of existing connections using the command:
The list of available network connections appear with the names and UUIDs.
Enable a connection using the name or UUID.
If networking is disabled using nmcli networking off command, run the following command to enable:
View the connection status using the command:
To enable a Wi-Fi network connection, run the following command:
step.screen: nmcli device wifi connect SSID password password

section.title: Disable Network Connection
section.para: You can disable network connection using the nmcli command. You can disable a network connection to isolate the system temporarily from external networks.

step.para: View the list of active connections using the command:
The list of active network connections appear with the names and UUIDs.
Terminate a specific connection using the command
step.screen: nmcli connection down connection-name or connection-uuid
